text: Paula Ann Zahn (born February 24, 1956 in Omaha, Nebraska) is an American journalist and news anchor. She worked for the news divisions on Columbia Broadcasting System(CBS)-Television and American Broadcasting Company(ABC)-Television, and on the cable television news channels Fox News Network and Cable News Network (CNN). On Fox News Channel she hosted The Edge with Paula Zahn. On CNN she hosted Paula Zahn Now and People in the News, a show jointly produced by CNN and People, a magazine. ==References== Category:American journalists Category:Writers from Omaha, Nebraska Category:1956 births Category:Living people
title: Paula Zahn
